entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 16.
